verses.verse: He cried <WH7121> also in my ears <WH241> with a loud <WH1419> voice, <WH6963> saying, <WH559> Cause them that have charge <WH6486> over the city <WH5892> to draw near, <WH7126> even every man <WH376> with his destroying <WH4892> weapon <WH3627> in his hand. <WH3027>

And, behold, <WH2009> six <WH8337> men <WH582> came <WH935> from the way <WH1870> of the higher <WH5945> gate, <WH8179> which <WH834> lies toward the north, <WH6828> and every man <WH376> a slaughter <WH4660> weapon <WH3627> in his hand; <WH3027> and one <WH259> man <WH376> among <WH8432> them was clothed <WH3847> with linen, <WH906> with a writer's <WH5608> inkhorn <WH7083> by his side: <WH4975> and they went <WH935> in, and stood <WH5975> beside <WH681> the brazen <WH5178> altar. <WH4196>

And the glory <WH3519> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> was gone <WH5927> up from the cherub, <WH3742> whereupon <WH834> <WH5921> he was, to the threshold <WH4670> of the house. <WH1004> And he called <WH7121> to the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> with linen, <WH906> which <WH834> had the writer's <WH5608> inkhorn <WH7083> by his side; <WH4975>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, Go <WH5674> through <WH5674> the middle <WH8432> of the city, <WH5892> through the middle <WH8432> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and set <WH8427> a mark <WH8420> on the foreheads <WH4696> of the men <WH582> that sigh <WH584> and that cry <WH602> for all <WH3605> the abominations <WH8441> that be done <WH6213> in the middle <WH8432> thereof.

And to the others <WH428> he said <WH559> in my hearing, <WH241> Go <WH5674> you after <WH310> him through the city, <WH5892> and smite: <WH5221> let not your eye <WH5869> spare, <WH2347> neither <WH408> have you pity: <WH2550>

Slay <WH2026> utterly old <WH2205> and young, <WH970> both maids, <WH1330> and little <WH2945> children, <WH2945> and women: <WH802> but come <WH5066> not near <WH5066> any <WH3605> man <WH376> on whom <WH834> is the mark; <WH8420> and begin <WH2490> at my sanctuary. <WH4720> Then they began <WH2490> at the ancient <WH2204> men <WH582> which <WH834> were before <WH6440> the house. <WH1004>

And he said <WH559> to them, Defile <WH2930> the house, <WH1004> and fill <WH4390> the courts <WH2691> with the slain: <WH2491> go <WH3318> you forth. <WH3318> And they went <WH3318> forth, <WH3318> and slew <WH5221> in the city. <WH5892>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, while they were slaying <WH5221> them, and I was left, <WH7604> that I fell <WH5307> on my face, <WH6440> and cried, <WH2199> and said, <WH559> Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD! <WH3069> will you destroy <WH7843> all <WH3605> the residue <WH7611> of Israel <WH3478> in your pouring <WH8210> out of your fury <WH2534> on Jerusalem? <WH3389>

Then said <WH559> he to me, The iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and Judah <WH3063> is exceeding <WH3966> great, <WH1419> and the land <WH776> is full <WH4390> of blood, <WH1818> and the city <WH5892> full <WH4390> of perverseness: <WH4297> for they say, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> has forsaken <WH5800> the earth, <WH776> and the LORD <WH3068> sees <WH7200> not.
And as for me also, <WH1571> my eye <WH5869> shall not spare, <WH2347> neither <WH3808> will I have pity, <WH2550> but I will recompense <WH5414> their way <WH1870> on their head. <WH7218>

And, behold, <WH2009> the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> with linen, <WH906> which <WH834> had the inkhorn <WH7083> by his side, <WH4975> reported <WH7725> the matter, <WH1697> saying, <WH559> I have done <WH6213> as you have commanded <WH6680> me.
